snp3.7:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava anguttarapesu carikam caramano mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim addhatelasehi bhikkhusatehi yena apanam nama anguttarapanam nigamo tadavasari.
snp3.7:1.4: “samano khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakula pabbajito anguttarapesu carikam caramano mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim addhatelasehi bhikkhusatehi apanam anuppatto.
snp3.7:1.5: Tam kho pana bhavantam gotamam evam kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggato:
snp3.7:1.6: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’ti.
snp3.7:1.7: So imam lokam sadevakam samarakam sabrahmakam sassamanabrahmanim pajam sadevamanussam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedeti.
snp3.7:1.8: So dhammam deseti adikalyanam majjhekalyanam pariyosanakalyanam sattham sabyanjanam, kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam pakaseti.
snp3.7:1.9: Sadhu kho pana tatharupanam arahatam dassanam hoti”ti.
snp3.7:2.1: Atha kho keniyo jatilo yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
snp3.7:2.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi.
snp3.7:2.3: Ekamantam nisinnam kho keniyam jatilam bhagava dhammiya kathaya sandassesi samadapesi samuttejesi sampahamsesi.
snp3.7:2.4: Atha kho keniyo jatilo bhagavata dhammiya kathaya sandassito samadapito samuttejito sampahamsito bhagavantam etadavoca:
snp3.7:2.5: “adhivasetu me bhavam gotamo svatanaya bhattam saddhim bhikkhusanghena”ti.
snp3.7:2.6: Evam vutte, bhagava keniyam jatilam etadavoca:
snp3.7:2.7: “maha kho, keniya, bhikkhusangho addhatelasani bhikkhusatani; tvanca brahmanesu abhippasanno”ti.
snp3.7:3.1: Dutiyampi kho keniyo jatilo bhagavantam etadavoca:
snp3.7:3.2: “kincapi, bho gotama, maha bhikkhusangho addhatelasani bhikkhusatani, ahanca brahmanesu abhippasanno;
snp3.7:3.3: adhivasetu me bhavam gotamo svatanaya bhattam saddhim bhikkhusanghena”ti.
snp3.7:3.4: Dutiyampi kho bhagava keniyam jatilam etadavoca:
snp3.7:3.5: “maha kho, keniya, bhikkhusangho addhatelasani bhikkhusatani; tvanca brahmanesu abhippasanno”ti.
snp3.7:4.1: Tatiyampi kho keniyo jatilo bhagavantam etadavoca:
snp3.7:4.2: “kincapi, bho gotama, maha bhikkhusangho addhatelasani bhikkhusatani, ahanca brahmanesu abhippasanno,
snp3.7:4.3: adhivasetu me bhavam gotamo svatanaya bhattam saddhim bhikkhusanghena”ti.
snp3.7:4.5: Atha kho keniyo jatilo bhagavato adhivasanam viditva utthayasana yena sako assamo tenupasankami; upasankamitva mittamacce natisalohite amantesi:
snp3.7:4.7: samano me gotamo nimantito svatanaya bhattam saddhim bhikkhusanghena,
snp3.7:4.9: “Evam, bho”ti kho keniyassa jatilassa mittamacca natisalohita keniyassa jatilassa patissutva appekacce uddhanani khananti, appekacce katthani phalenti, appekacce bhajanani dhovanti, appekacce udakamanikam patitthapenti, appekacce asanani pannapenti.
snp3.7:4.10: Keniyo pana jatilo samamyeva mandalamalam patiyadeti.
snp3.7:5.1: Tena kho pana samayena selo brahmano apane pativasati, tinnam vedanam paragu sanighanduketubhanam sakkharappabhedanam itihasapancamanam padako veyyakarano lokayatamahapurisalakkhanesu anavayo, tini ca manavakasatani mante vaceti.
snp3.7:6.1: Tena kho pana samayena keniyo jatilo sele brahmane abhippasanno hoti.
snp3.7:6.2: Atha kho selo brahmano tihi manavakasatehi parivuto janghaviharam anucankamamano anuvicaramano yena keniyassa jatilassa assamo tenupasankami.
snp3.7:6.3: Addasa kho selo brahmano keniyassa jatilassa assame appekacce uddhanani khanante …pe… appekacce asanani pannapente, keniyam pana jatilam samamyeva mandalamalam patiyadentam.
snp3.7:6.5: “kim nu kho bhoto keniyassa avaho va bhavissati, vivaho va bhavissati, mahayanno va paccupatthito, raja va magadho seniyo bimbisaro nimantito svatanaya saddhim balakayena”ti?
snp3.7:7.1: “Na me, bho sela, avaho va bhavissati vivaho va, napi raja magadho seniyo bimbisaro nimantito svatanaya saddhim balakayena;
snp3.7:7.2: api ca kho me mahayanno paccupatthito.
snp3.7:7.3: Atthi samano gotamo sakyaputto sakyakula pabbajito anguttarapesu carikam caramano mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim addhatelasehi bhikkhusatehi apanam anuppatto.
snp3.7:7.6: So me nimantito svatanaya bhattam saddhim bhikkhusanghena”ti.
snp3.7:8.2: “ghosopi kho eso dullabho lokasmim, yadidam buddhoti.
snp3.7:8.3: Agatani kho panamhakam mantesu dvattimsamahapurisalakkhanani, yehi samannagatassa mahapurisassa dveva gatiyo bhavanti ananna.
snp3.7:8.4: Sace agaram ajjhavasati raja hoti cakkavatti dhammiko dhammaraja caturanto vijitavi janapadatthavariyappatto sattaratanasamannagato.
snp3.7:8.6: cakkaratanam, hatthiratanam, assaratanam, maniratanam, itthiratanam, gahapatiratanam, parinayakaratanameva sattamam.
snp3.7:8.7: Parosahassam kho panassa putta bhavanti sura virangarupa parasenappamaddana.
snp3.7:8.8: So imam pathavim sagarapariyantam adandena asatthena dhammena abhivijiya ajjhavasati.
snp3.7:8.9: Sace kho pana agarasma anagariyam pabbajati, araham hoti sammasambuddho loke vivattacchado.
snp3.7:8.10: Kaham pana, bho keniya, etarahi so bhavam gotamo viharati araham sammasambuddho”ti?
snp3.7:9.1: Evam vutte, keniyo jatilo dakkhinam bahum paggahetva selam brahmanam etadavoca:
snp3.7:9.3: Atha kho selo brahmano tihi manavakasatehi saddhim yena bhagava tenupasankami.
snp3.7:9.4: Atha kho selo brahmano te manavake amantesi:
snp3.7:9.6: Durasada hi te bhagavanto sihava ekacara.
snp3.7:9.7: Yada caham, bho, samanena gotamena saddhim manteyyam, ma me bhonto antarantara katham opatetha;
snp3.7:10.1: Atha kho selo brahmano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
snp3.7:10.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi.
snp3.7:10.3: Ekamantam nisinno kho selo brahmano bhagavato kaye dvattimsamahapurisalakkhanani samannesi.
snp3.7:10.4: Addasa kho selo brahmano bhagavato kaye dvattimsamahapurisalakkhanani yebhuyyena thapetva dve.
snp3.7:10.5: Dvisu mahapurisalakkhanesu kankhati vicikicchati nadhimuccati na sampasidati—
snp3.7:11.2: “passati kho me ayam selo brahmano dvattimsamahapurisalakkhanani yebhuyyena thapetva dve.
snp3.7:11.3: Dvisu mahapurisalakkhanesu kankhati vicikicchati nadhimuccati na sampasidati—
snp3.7:11.5: Atha kho bhagava tatharupam iddhabhisankharam abhisankhasi, yatha addasa selo brahmano bhagavato kosohitam vatthaguyham.
snp3.7:11.6: Atha kho bhagava jivham ninnametva ubhopi kannasotani anumasi patimasi, ubhopi nasikasotani anumasi patimasi, kevalampi nalatamandalam jivhaya chadesi.
snp3.7:12.2: “samannagato kho samano gotamo dvattimsamahapurisalakkhanehi paripunnehi, no aparipunnehi.
snp3.7:12.3: No ca kho nam janami buddho va no va.
snp3.7:12.4: Sutam kho pana metam brahmananam vuddhanam mahallakanam acariyapacariyanam bhasamananam:
snp3.7:12.5: ‘ye te bhavanti arahanto sammasambuddha, te sake vanne bhannamane attanam patukaronti’ti.
snp3.7:12.6: Yannunaham samanam gotamam sammukha saruppahi gathahi abhitthaveyyan”ti.
snp3.7:12.7: Atha kho selo brahmano bhagavantam sammukha saruppahi gathahi abhitthavi:
snp3.7:33.1: Alattha kho selo brahmano sapariso bhagavato santike pabbajjam, alattha upasampadam.
snp3.7:33.2: Atha kho keniyo jatilo tassa rattiya accayena sake assame panitam khadaniyam bhojaniyam patiyadapetva bhagavato kalam arocapesi:
snp3.7:33.4: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yena keniyassa jatilassa assamo tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi saddhim bhikkhusanghena.
snp3.7:34.1: Atha kho keniyo jatilo buddhappamukham bhikkhusangham panitena khadaniyena bhojaniyena sahattha santappesi sampavaresi.
snp3.7:34.2: Atha kho keniyo jatilo bhagavantam bhuttavim onitapattapanim annataram nicam asanam gahetva ekamantam nisidi.
snp3.7:34.3: Ekamantam nisinnam kho keniyam jatilam bhagava imahi gathahi anumodi:
snp3.7:37.1: Atha kho bhagava keniyam jatilam imahi gathahi anumoditva utthayasana pakkami.
snp3.7:37.2: Atha kho ayasma selo sapariso eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva …pe…
snp3.7:37.3: annataro kho panayasma selo sapariso arahatam ahosi.
snp3.7:38.1: Atha kho ayasma selo sapariso yena bhagava tenupasankami, upasankamitva ekamsam civaram katva yena bhagava tenanjalim panametva bhagavantam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
